title: Urban poverty headcount ratio at national poverty lines (% of urban population)
name: si.pov.urhc
readme: Urban poverty headcount ratio is the percentage of the urban population living below the national poverty lines.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Urban poverty headcount ratio is the percentage of the urban population living below the national poverty lines.
